ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Used to categorize the result of a finding. Examples: "TREATMENT RELATED", "NONTREATMENT RELATED", "UNDETERMINED", "ACCIDENTAL".

DataElement.changeDescription: 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. 2-22-19 Curated to support CDISC Initiative; tmt.
